senses.sense_definition: A specific type of belay device with an assisted braking mechanism used in rock climbing.

examples.text: Please check that you have threaded the rope correctly through the <w>grigri</w>.
He prefers to use a <w>grigri</w> when belaying his partner on difficult routes.

senses.sense_definition: An alternative spelling of <w>gris-gris</w>, a charm, amulet, or spell used in Voodoo and some African traditional religions.

examples.text: The old woman gave him a small <w>grigri</w> to wear for protection against bad luck.
He kept a leather <w>grigri</w> in his pocket during the long journey.
